forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 5 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 52. West southwest wind 7 to 13 mph.

weather_report:
As the day unfolds over Downtown San Francisco, the atmosphere is graced with sunshine that bathes the city in a gentle, golden light. A mild breeze carries hints of salt and the promise of an enjoyable afternoon, with the temperature holding steady in the low sixties. Despite the sun’s cheerful presence, a subtle reminder of San Francisco's famous temperament lingers, offering occasional whispers of the marine layer clinging to the edges of the horizon. The horizon may hold the soft embrace of silky fog, but today, it appears more as an artistic backdrop than a thick curtain, inviting exploration among the vibrant neighborhoods.

With such pleasant conditions prevailing, light layers will be your best companion; perhaps a breathable long-sleeve shirt paired with comfortable walking shoes. A light jacket could serve well come evening, as clouds gather to usher in the coolness of the night. This is a splendid opportunity to wander through the charming streets of the Mission District, savoring a casual taco from one of the many hidden gems, or to stroll along the Embarcadero, perhaps with a warm coffee in hand while breathing in the brisk bay air. As the day winds down, the remnants of the sun's warmth juxtaposed with the night’s embrace promises a transition that feels uniquely San Francisco, beckoning one to partake in the simple yet profound pleasures this vibrant city offers.
